description: The Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round is a fin-stabilized steel needle packed into a plastic sabot which breaks apart shortly after the round clears the chamber.  The resulting cartridge is far lighter and produces lower recoil than a conventional round, while the projectile makes up for its low mass with extreme velocity and long range.

The Rivtech 5x50mm penetrator round is a fin-stabilized armor-penetrating tungsten needle packed into a plastic sabot which breaks apart shortly after the round clears the chamber.  The resulting cartridge is far lighter and produces lower recoil than a conventional round, while the projectile makes up for its low mass with extreme velocity and long range.

The Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round is a fin-stabilized steel needle packed into a plastic sabot which breaks apart shortly after the round clears the chamber.  The resulting cartridge is far lighter and produces lower recoil than a conventional round, while the projectile makes up for its low mass with extreme velocity and long range.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a lucky survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm corporate spy, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
